overview: Brian is the founder and CEO of watchMEmelt.com, the worlds first video sharing destination for the weight loss and fitness community. Brian began his career in the internet business during the original dot com boom as the Content Acquisitions Manager for MegaChannels.com and then as the VP of Business Development for publicly traded search engine, YSeek. Brian is a natural born motivator and serial brainstormer. He’s a professional artist, entrepreneur, adventurer and creative forward-thinker with big ideas for the future.
